DOC.brief_summary: The application of the TLR7/8 (Toll Like Receptor) agonist gel (immune response helper) resiquimod will enhance the immune response to the intradermal influenza vaccine in seniors 65-75 years of age.
DOC.brief_title: Enhancing Influenza Vaccination in Seniors With TLR (Toll Like Receptor) Agonists
